name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HouseMoney: Win Cash When You Shop Online

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Win up to $500 every week while shopping online. 

HouseMoney is a simple browser extension that turns your online purchases into big winnings! The more you shop, the more chances you get to win. And because it costs absolutely nothing to play, you can't lose! 

HOW IT WORKS
Shopping sites pay a small percentage of their advertising dollars to browser extensions to keep you on their site. Other Browser Extensions give you coupons. A couple of others give you some of those cash back. We thought it would be fun to take this pocket change from a bunch of people and have a sweepstakes for the whole pot. You may not win, but you can't lose. 

GET STARTED NOW
It’s as easy as adding the extension to your browser, shopping as usual and then checking our Thursday night drawings. 

It’s easy to play. Easy to win. And we’ll send you your winnings right away, so it’s easy to get paid. You can’t lose. 

By using this add-on, you agree to the HouseMoney Terms of Service available at http://www.joinhousemoney.com/terms

Please see our Privacy Policy at https://www.joinhousemoney.com/privacy-policy
